scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run build:assets
scripts.build:assets: mkdir -p dist/assets/images dist/assets/fonts && cp node_modules/govuk-frontend/dist/govuk/assets/images/* node_modules/@ministryofjustice/frontend/moj/assets/images/* dist/assets/images && cp node_modules/govuk-frontend/dist/govuk/assets/fonts/* dist/assets/fonts
scripts.watch: npm run build:js --watch=forever & npm run build:css --watch
